CHANGES
=======

0.1.2 (2016-09-07)
------------------

* Fix links, tune docs theme.

0.1.1 (2016-09-06)
------------------

* Update REAMDE, old version used obsolete AIP

0.1.0 (2016-09-06)
------------------

* The library was deeply refactored, bytes are gone away but all
  accepted strings are encoded if needed.

0.0.1 (2016-08-30)
------------------

* The first release.
